attributes.action: I wish to start a petition to reverse Sadiq Khans Knight hood.
attributes.additional_details: I think they should reverse the decisio.
attributes.background: To discuss the proposed Knighthood of Sadiq Khan. A Knighthood should be  a huge honour for people who deserve it.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
